attributes.action: offer a full public apology to the Chairman of the Lloyds Banking Group
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: The Prime Minister FORCED Lloyds TSB to take over HBOS, and now that it has gone bad, the Chairman of the Group is loosing his job.  Had the Government not forced this ill-advised takeover, the Chairman wouldn't have lost his job and for that reason the Government owes him a public apology.

rejection.details: Asking the PM to apologise is not considered to be a recognisable action. Please rephrase.
reasons: Wording that needs to be amended, or is impossible to understand
